text: U ewan (filan aha) gotine: "Evan taris u candiniyen hanenan (bisixurandin) dest li wan nakebe, ji pestire wane ku biven, tu kes ewan naxwe; di gomana wan da (wusa ne) u hinek taris ji (le siyarbuna wan) ne durist buye u hinek tarisan ji (di gava serjekirine) nave Yezdan li ser naxunin, bi vir (Evan: "Gorine Yezdan in," dibejin). We (Yezdane) bi sedema wan viren ku ewan dikiribune, ewan celat bike
